message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
Let's meet in the middle, Alice. It's a good starting point.
You're being too cautious, Bob. I'm willing to take a bit more risk to get a better deal.
You're taking more risk, but I'm not taking it that far. I'll meet you in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me.
I'm taking a bigger risk, Bob. You need to meet me halfway to get a decent share.
You're pushing the limits, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Time to make a serious offer.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to go easy on you.
I'm making my final move, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You're really running out of time, Alice. I'll give you a decent offer, but it's take it or leave it.
This is my last serious offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
